author: undetermined
full_text:
I apologize, but the provided HTML content appears to be a listing page of multiple fact-check stories, not a single specific fact-check article. The content contains a list of fact-check headlines and thumbnail images, but does not include the full text of any individual fact-check investigation.

To process a specific fact-check article, I would need the full HTML content of the individual story page. The current HTML is a homepage or listing view of various fact-check stories from what seems to be the India Today fact-check section.

If you would like me to extract the text content, you would need to provide the HTML for a specific fact-check article's full page.
title:
Hello. Thank you for reaching out to India Today AFWA fact check helpline. Please send the message/video/image that you find suspicious to us and we will verify and send a fact-check report to you related to your query.

You can choose your preferred language and follow the instructions given by the bot to send us your query.

Read the latest fact checks here:
